title: Zayed University students land 2nd-prize at leading international environment & sustainability competition
summary: A team of three students from Zayed University's (ZU), College of Natural & Health Sciences (CNHS), have recently won the second place prize in the Smart Environment Category at the 2022 International Student Conference on Environment and Sustainability (ISCES 2022), which was held  at Tongji University in China.

title: Zayed University Council discuss strategic plans to meet future employment market demands
summary: Led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), members of the Zayed University Council held the second meeting of 2022 to review several topics on the Council's agenda.

title: Zayed University professor leads uranium geology research in the MENA region
summary: A newly published book, entitled 'Uranium Geology in the Middle East and North Africa,' highlights the major reserves of resources that the region enjoys, tackles the exploration era and Development Program around that exclusive field.

title: Zayed University and AD Ports Group ink MoU for Development of Maritime Sustainability Solutions and Education
summary: Zayed University, one of Dubai's leading public universities, has signed an MoU with AD Ports Group, the region's premier facilitator of logistics, industry, and trade in Abu Dhabi, to spearhead a number of sustainable development goals across several key areas.

title: Zayed University Receives Malaysian Minister Of Women, Family And Community Development
summary: Members of the Zayed University (ZU) has recently received Her Excellency Rina Harun, Minister of Women's Affairs, Family and Community Development - Malaysia, during a recent visit by her and her accompanying delegation to the university campus in Dubai.

title: Zayed University to Celebrate Class of 'Future Makers' Graduation Ceremony March 14th to 16th at Expo 2020
summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), the University announced its preparation to celebrate the graduation ceremony of the 19th and 20th Cohort of Female undergraduates, 9th and 10th Cohorts of Male undergraduates and selected cohorts of Master graduates, which will be taking place in person at the North Hall of the Dubai Exhibition Center at EXPO 2020 from the 14th to the 16th of March, 2022.

title: Hamed Bin Zayed Attends the Graduation of Zayed University Masters Graduates & Honors Graduates and Undergraduates
summary: Under the patronage and in the presence of His Highness Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Member of the Executive Council of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi,  Zayed University celebrated its 2022 Graduation Ceremony under the theme "Future Makers" , with 618 Masters Graduates & Honors Undergraduate Students during an exceptional event held on Wednesday (March 16th) in the presence of His Excellency Sheikh Shakhboot Bin Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of State, and other VIP guests at EXPO 2020 in the North Hall of the Dubai Exhibition Centre.

title: International Competition aims to stimulate innovative development towards the enhancement of the education sector
summary: On the occasion of "UAE Innovates 2022", Zayed University launches an international virtual competition titled "IDEATHON 2022", targeting school and university students from all over the world between the ages of 17 and 20 years old, to bring forward and create innovative solutions that contribute to enhancing education in schools and universities.

title: Zayed University Inks An Academic Agreement With University Of Madda Walabu
summary: Zayed University signed a cooperation agreement with the Ethiopian University of Madda Walabu to explore new grounds of academic research, educational programs, and training opportunities for university students.

title: Zayed University participates in the Global Education and Training Exhibition 2022
summary: Zayed University (ZU) participates in the Global Education and Training Exhibition 2022 (GETEX), which is held under the patronage of His Excellency Sheikh Nahyan bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Tolerance and Coexistence in the UAE, at the Sheikh Rashid Hall - Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Center from February 24 to 26.

title: Zayed University named Apple distinguished school
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) is pleased to announce that it has been recognized as an Apple Distinguished School for 2021-2024, for being continuously innovative in learning, teaching, and providing an excellent educational environment for Students of Determination at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University joins a premier international conference to explore security of microelectronic systems
summary: Zayed University has joined as the technical sponsor of the recently hosted 28th IEEE International Conference on Electronics Circuits and Systems at Sofitel Dubai the Obelisk. The four-day show focused on the design and innovation aspect of the circuits and systems space.

title: Zayed University Council discusses a number of policies and procedures for a future full of achievements over the next 50 years
summary: Zayed University Council held its fourth and last meeting for the academic year 2021/2022, chaired by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, at the VIP Hall in the UAE pavilion at Expo 2020 Dubai. The meeting agenda focused on future-focused policies that aligned the academic agenda with the nation's vision.

title: Zayed University Organizes An Awareness Initiative To Improve The Quality Of Education For Students Of Determination
summary: The Student Accessibility Services Department (SAS) at Zayed University organized an awareness campaign with the participation of Al Ahlia Charitable Schools to improve students of determination teaching quality, effectiveness and easy access to educational services.

title: Zayed University embarks on academic partnership with University of Haifa
summary: H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Prof. Ron Robin, President of Haifa University, Zayed University (ZU) have recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding virtually to form an academic partnership to cooperate on projects that promote research, education, outreach, and capacity building.

title: Zayed University to celebrate UAE's golden jubilee through the Middle East Film Festival
summary: Under the patronage of H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, the 11th annual Zayed University Middle East Film Festival (ZUMEFF) has been scheduled to take place online between Nov 16th to 18th, 2021.

title: Zayed University students design & co-create solutions for a more balanced and equal world
summary: Zayed University female students participated in an interactive session to co-create and design solutions for a diverse set of pre-defined challenges under the 5th Global Goal for Sustainable Development (SDG5): "Gender equality including women empowerment" such as disadvantaged communities, leadership representation of women in all sectors, senior management and board positions, and the elimination of bias and stereotypes through the use of technology.

title: Partnership to encourage more Emiratis to choose private over public sector
summary: Zayed University (ZU) a leading academic institution in the UAE, has recently connected with Al Fardan Exchange to offer 100 Emirati students and alumni free online training programs in Anti-Money laundering, Identifying fake currencies, and risk management.

title: Zayed University welcomed over 1200 prospective students at the International Education Show
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has welcomed over 1200 students for the upcoming Fall 2022 during their participation at the 17th International Education Show which was held for three days starting Oct 19th to Oct 21 at the Sharjah Expo Center.

title: Zayed University discusses employability of people with visual impairment
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) at Zayed University (ZU) celebrated the annual 'International White Cane Day' by hosting a virtual event that addressed and discussed Employability of people with vision impairment.

title: Nasa Deputy Administrator stirs Zayed University students to become the aspiring leaders of the future
summary: Deputy Administrator of NASA, Col. (USAF, ret) Pam Melroy was recently received to lecture at the Zayed University Dubai campus' atrium, where she enlightened STEM students about the necessity of setting up the next generation for success and exploring ways of becoming the leaders they aspire to be.

title: UAE's first Hyperspectral Remote Sensing Center offers spectral library website for public use
summary: The Hyperspectral Remote Sensing Center at the College of Natural and Health Sciences at Zayed University has earned a commendable badge by presenting the first UAE Spectral Library website for public use, where users can interact and access spectral information derived using a Use hyperspectral camera and Field Portable Spectroradiometers, as well as remote sensing images from space and airborne platforms for remote spectroscopic sensing.

title: 2730 Students get labour market practical training
summary: 2,730 Zayed University (ZU) alumni and students have recently joined the 1st edition of the ZU 'ZU Summer Career Camp 50x50' which focuses on students' capacity building, development of professional skills and preparing the youth for the requirements of the job market.

title: Zayed University moves up in the World University Rankings 2022 To 601-800
summary: Zayed University, a national and regional leader of educational innovation, has moved up in the 2022 Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings to 601-800 from the 801-1000 band in 2021.

title: Zayed University alumni host a virtual session highlighting the Importance of Innovation
summary: Zayed University Alumni Association, in coordination with the Student Careers and Alumni Department, hosted five graduates experts in the field of innovation and entrepreneurship, including graduates of the Mohammed Bin Rashid Center for government innovation.

title: Zayed University advances social responsibilty & gender equality agenda through a pioneering academic partnership with UN Women
summary: Celebrating the Emirati Women's Day, Zayed University (ZU) has become an ally of the UN Women Unstereotype Alliance UAE chapter, the first academic institution in the region to become an ally of the chapter.

title: Over 1,000 Emirati students enroll in the Al Ghurair Young Thinkers Program for career readiness
summary: Zayed University (ZU) and the Abdulla Al Ghurair Foundation for Education (AGFE), have successfully marked the first year of their partnership, following a Memorandum of Understanding between the two entities to support Emirati youth along their education and early employment journeys.

title: Zayed University Senior Projects 2021: An expression of reality through the eyes of young artists
summary: ShowCACE 2021 a creative arts exhibition was recently unveiled by Senior students from  Zayed University (ZU) College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) features project ideas and concepts around social awareness, productivity, healing and self-expression, and more.

title: Zayed University Council review policies and procedures related to interdisciplinary education, hybrid education courses and Student Affairs
summary: Zayed University Council held its third meeting for the year 2021, chaired by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, at the Convention Center at the University Campus in Dubai to review a number of topics on its agenda.

title: Zayed University partners with education innovator Minerva Project to launch the Middle East's first interdisciplinary programme
summary: Zayed University has joined forces with Minerva Project, the pathbreaking US-based educational innovator, to launch the first  interdisciplinary programme of study in the Middle East. The partnership, Zayed University X Minerva, was formally signed in Dubai on 8 June 2021 in the presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Ben Nelson, the Founder and CEO of Minerva Project.

title: Zayed University amongst the 700 Qs World University Ranking
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has increased by 50 ranks, up to the 651-700 range in the QS (Quacquarelli Symonds) World University Rankings 2022, the world’s most-consulted source of comparative information about university performance.

title: Zayed University Partners With IBM, Microsoft And SAP University to Boost Student Creativity and Employability
summary: A state-of-the-art innovation workspace 'The NextGen Center' was recently inaugurated by H.E. Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), at the ZU Campus in Dubai. The Center aims to provide students the opportunity to connect and co-innovate with global industry leaders.

title: ZU Student Lands 1st Place at the EY Corporate Finance Woman of the Year Awards
summary: Zayed University (ZU) student, Shama Al Hosani, has been recently named the winner of the Ernst & Young's (EY) Corporate Finance Woman of the Year (CWFY) award for the UAE, following a confront with seven shortlisted finalists from across the country.

title: Zayed University Wins 2 awards in the assessment of the Global Star Rating Systems for Services (GSRR)
summary: Zayed University has recently won 2 out of 4 service delivery channels awards, during its first participation in the assessment of the Global Star Rating Systems for Services (GSRR).

title: Internationally recognized Digital Marketing Certification for Zayed University business students
summary: Zayed University and the Digital Marketing Institute (DMI) have announced a new partnership that integrates DMI's industry leading digital marketing certifications into the Digital Marketing and Commerce course in the College of Business at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University celebrates learning diversity
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) at Zayed University (ZU) has recently organized an online event under the theme of 'Celebrate Learning Diversity'.

title: Zayed University Council holds 2nd meeting for 2021
summary: Led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), members of the Zayed University Council held their second meeting of 2021 to review several topics on the Council's agenda.

title: Zayed University Graduates showCACE Arts Exhibition in Abu Dhabi
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has recently disclosed the latest edition of the showCACE 2020 Senior Exhibition showcasing 52 projects, covering the four majors in the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE): visual arts, interior design, animation design and graphic design. The exhibition is currently being held at Manarat Al Saadiyat in Abu Dhabi until March 19th 2021.

title: Zayed University's First Incubated Startup, Takalam, Wins Enterprise Agility Award by Entrepreneur Middle East
summary: Health-tech start-up Takalam, an online counseling platform for mental well-being, recently won the Wellness Platform of The Year Award by Entrepreneur Middle East. This annual award series recognizes businesses and individuals across the Middle East that have established themselves as clear industry innovators.

title: Noura Al Kaabi Welcomes New Zayed University Alumni Association Board Members
summary: Zayed University welcomed new 32 members to The Zayed University (ZU) Alumni Association Board for the 2020-2023 academic years in a recent online ceremony held under the patronage and attendance of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth and President of Zayed University.

title: Zayed University and the Mexican Embassy discuss ways of cooperation in the cultural and academic fields
summary: Zayed University held a virtual meeting with the Mexican Embassy, in the presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Her Excellency Francisca E. Méndez Escobar, Ambassador of Mexico to the country, to discuss ways of future cooperation and partnerships in the cultural and academic fields.

title: Zayed University's 3rd Annual Education Conference Scheduled to Explore the Next 50 Years in Education
summary: In partnership with the Ministry of Education and Arab Thought Foundation, Zayed University will be hosting the 3rd annual Education Conference, themed “Zayed’s Legacy: the next 50 years start now” which will be held online on Monday, November 9th, and will be attended by Ministers and a number of international educational experts.

title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Flag Day
summary: Zayed University celebrated the UAE Flag Day on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, commemorating the accession of His Highness Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al-Nahyan as the president of the UAE.

title: Zayed University Students Share Experience of Craft Workshop in Hawaii
summary: Zayed University (ZU) Students from the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) have virtually shared their overseas visit to the Island of Oahu, which was part of an exchange meeting with students from the University of Hawaii at Manoa, and presented their take on the new culture and craft workshops.

title: Experts Discuss the Next Five Decades in Education to Meet UAE Centennial Objectives
summary: Zayed University virtually held the 3rd annual Education Conference "Zayed's Legacy: the next 50 years start now" hosting over 500 education experts to address and explore the future of education over the next 5 decades for the UAE Centennial 2071 Objectives. The conference was organized in collaboration between Zayed University's College of Education, UAE Ministry of Education and the Arab Thought Foundation.

title: Academic Collaboration in Cultural Heritage between Zayed University and the Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport in Egypt
summary: Zayed University held virtually a webinar session organized by the College of Humanities and Social Sciences at Zayed University and the College of Archeology and Cultural Heritage at the Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport in Egypt to discuss ways of cooperation between the two universities in the fields of culture and heritage.

title: Zayed University Offers Employment Opportunities to 840 Graduates and Students through a Virtual Career Fair
summary: "Gateway to Career Opportunities" was the theme of the first virtual career fair for the new academic year 2020/2021 organized by the Students Career and Alumni Department at Zayed University (ZU), with the aim of supporting Emiratization and providing employment opportunities for university students and graduates and helping them build their career options on practical grounds.

title: Zayed University Indorses the Importance of Mental Health
summary: Zayed University raised awareness about the importance of mental health through a series of virtual activities and workshops titled "Your Mental Health Matters" coinciding with the World Mental Health Day 2020, under the theme "Mental Health for All: Greater Investment - Greater Access."

title: Zayed University Lands the Times Higher Education 2021 World University Rankings
summary: Zayed University, a national and regional leader of educational innovation, has been recently listed, for the very first time, in the 2021 Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings, which is an annual ranking of higher education institutions globally.

title: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak, Patron of Zayed University Applauds Graduates at 2020 Virtual Commencement Ceremony
summary: Under the patronage of Her Highness Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak, Chairwoman of the General Women's Union, President of the Supreme Council for Motherhood and Childhood, and Supreme Chairwoman of the Family Development Foundation, Zayed University held its very first "virtual" graduation ceremony, to honor undergraduates and graduates of the 18th cohort of female and the 8th cohort of males.

title: Zayed University Switches to Hybrid Model of Teaching, Learning for Fall 2020 Semester
summary: Preparations are in full swing at Zayed University’s (ZU) campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai to implement a hybrid education model for the Fall 2020 semester. The "hybrid" (or "blended") education model aims to enable teaching and learning to continue both online and partially on campus, amid the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Zayed University Continues to Demonstrate Steadfast Growth Year on Year:  Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi
summary: Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth and President of Zayed University, commended the organizations and entities for their support to the University's exceptional achievements in the field of higher education, and played a significant role in supporting (ZU) students during the academic year of 2019/2020.

title: Institutes Partner to Prepare University Students and Graduates for  Market of the Future
summary: Zayed University (ZU) and the Abdulla Al Ghurair Foundation for Education (AGFE), have virtually signed a Memorandum of Understanding to support young Emiratis and Arab youth along their education and early employment journeys.

title: University Council holds its second meeting for 2020
summary: Members of the Zayed University Council virtually met online and attended their second meeting for the 2019-2020 Academic year. The meeting was led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, to review several topics on their agenda.

title: Zayed University and Al-Mubarakah Foundation Collaborate to Drive More Emirati Youth Into Volunteering
summary: Sheikh Mohammed bin Khalifa bin Hamdan Al Nahyan, of the "Mubarakah Foundation" and Her Excellency Noura bint Muhammad Al-Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University have recently virtually signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU), to encourage youth volunteering, as per the UAE leadership's aspirations.

title: From Campus to Computer, your education is Zayed University's priority
summary: Following the last three weeks of Remote Learning, the management at Zayed Unit is very much aware of the concerns, uncertainty and challenges that our students have been experiencing during these trying times.

title: Special Grading Model Introduced at Zayed University Amid Remote-Learning Period
summary: Following the three weeks of Remote Learning, Zayed University (ZU) announced the implementation of a special grading model for courses of the Spring 2020 semester, to ensure students GPA won’t get effected due to current circumstances.

title: Zayed University Member Wins Prestigious Sheikh Zayed Book Award
summary: Zayed University Assistant professor, Dr. Mohamed Mihoub, was granted the prestigious Sheikh Zayed Book Award; one of the Arab world's most lucrative literary prizes, for his efforts in translating "Al-Insan Al-Romantiq" (L'homme Romantique) by the French Philosopher, Georges Gusdorf.

title: Emirati Professor Lands a Research Patent from the United States
summary: A patent was recently registered in the United States by Emirati researcher Dr. Fatima Taher, associate professor and assistant dean for research affairs at the College of Technical Innovation at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University Hosts the 12th Undergraduate Research Conference: Over 600 Participants from 7 countries attend Virtually
summary: Under the patronage of H.E. Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University (ZU), the 12th Annual Conference on Undergraduate Research on Applied Computing (URC2020) was, and for the very first time, held remotely online, due to the on-going events concerning COVID-19, and for the safety and health of everyone.

title: Public Diplomacy Shapes the Image of a Nation, Lectures Omar Ghobash
summary: His Excellency Omar Ghobash, Assistant Minister of Culture and Public Diplomacy – Ministry of Foreign Affairs, was warmly greeted at Zayed University recently to lecture students his take on "How Public Diplomacy Shapes the Image of a Nation."

title: Noura Al Kaabi Heads the First Zayed University Council 2020 Meeting
summary: Zayed University Council held its first meeting in 2020 led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, at the University's campus in Dubai recently.

title: Highest Education Quality Via Modern Technologies Remains Top Priority, Noura Al Kaabi
summary: In line with the UAE’s recent directives of enabling Online Learning across all educational institutions, Zayed University achieved tangible results, response, and great interaction in the distance learning experience after the end of the first week, as the faculty members succeeded in holding more than 7718 lectures and meetings via the Internet.

title: Al Maktoum Foundation Supports Zayed University Student Solidarity Fund
summary: His Excellency Mirza Al Sayegh, Member of the Board of Trustees of the Foundation and Director of the Office of H.H. Sheikh Hamdan bin Rashid Al Maktoum, handed Al Maktoum Foundation’s donation cheque worth AED300,000 to Dr. Behjat Al Yousuf, Vice-President of Zayed University, to support the Student Solidarity Fund.

title: Five Student Projects Turn Heads at Abu Dhabi Municipality Innovation Nation Activities
summary: Zayed University students participated in the "Innovation Nation" activities, which was organized by the Abu Dhabi City Municipality for the UAE Innovation Month, which comes in line with the UAE's strategy to prepare a new generation of talents as it transitions into a competitive knowledge-based economy.

title: Emirates Airline Festival of Literature and Ministry of Culture and Knowledge Development Organize a Lecture by American Writer Lesley Hazleton at Zayed University
summary: Under the Patronage and presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, the award-winning journalist, historian, and blogger, Lesley Hazleton, gave a lecture at Zayed University her take on the story of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) in her bestseller "The First Muslim: Story of Muhammed” as part of the Emirates Airline Festival of Literature’s Education Programme.

title: Students Safety and Security Forefronts Zayed University's Objectives
summary: 40 government and private companies showcased a variety of best practices in environmental protection, sustainability, health and safety during the 4th annual Environmental Health and Safety Campaign EHS-EVENT 2020, held on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai.

title: UAE - Japan Seek Further Cultural Ties, Japanese Ambassador
summary: His Excellency Akihiko Nakajima, the Ambassador of Japan to the UAE, believes that both nations, have actively developed bilateral relations in various sectors, and aims to further foster cultural development.

title: Drone Forensics Study and a Hacker Detector Showcased by ZU Students at the UMEX 2020
summary: 12 students from the College of Technological Innovation (CTI) of Zayed University showcased eight innovative projects related to drones, robotics, security, and autonomous systems, during the participation at the the Unmanned Systems Exhibition and Conference (UMEX) and Simulation and Training Exhibition and Conference (SimTEX).

title: Noura Al-Kaabi receives the Saudi Minister of Education at Zayed University
summary: Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammad Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, received His Excellency Dr. Hamad bin Muhammad Al Sheikh, Saudi Minister of Education and the accompanying delegation to the Zayed University's Dubai campus.

title: UAE - Korea Cultural Dialogue Initiates with Festive Welcome at Zayed University
summary: A major festival was organized yesterday, at the Abu Dhabi Zayed University campus, to initiate the UAE-Korea Cultural Dialogue for 2020, which commemorates the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the two nations.

title: Women Constitute Over 60% of The Science Fields in the Arab World, Lectures Dr. Dajani
summary: UNESCO International Literacy Prize winner, and 12th out of 100 most influential Arab women, Dr. Rana Dajani was recently hosted at Zayed University Abu Dhabi campus to lecture students about the five roles she plays in life.

title: GCC Seeks Economic Unity by 2025, Says Secretary General
summary: The Secretary-General of the Gulf Cooperation Council, H.E. Dr. Abdullatif bin Rashid Al-Zayani visited Zayed University campus in Dubai today. He was warmly welcomed by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, alongside Dr. Behjat Al Yousuf, Acting Vice-President of Zayed University.

title: Students Guided to Suitable Academic Majors and Career Paths
summary: "Major's Day", an annual academic guidance program, was recently organized on both Zayed University campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, where teachers assisted hundreds of students in choosing their majors and, therefore, their future careers.

title: Zayed University Received a QS 4 star Rating
summary: The QS Intelligence Unit has accepted the application submitted by the Office of the Provost and the office of institutional Research, and has awarded the University through QS Stars, a “four Stars” institution rating. Notably, ZU was awarded “Five Stars” within the core criteria of Teaching, employability, facilities and Inclusiveness

title: Noura Al Kaabi Joins Zayed University Students for UAE 48th National Day Celebrations
summary: Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, joined the students 48th National Day Celebrations in Abu Dhabi ZU campus.

title: Health at hand: how smartwatches are revolutionising healthcare
summary: Once, they were all about how many steps we took. Now, smartwatches can track the most intimate details of our health and fitness. Asad Khattak, mobile computing and health informatics expert at Zayed University, evaluates the impact of next-generation wearable technology for the healthcare industry

title: Zayed University Wins Blackboard Catalyst Award
summary: Staff from Zayed University, were named winners of the Blackboard Catalyst Award for Optimizing Student Experience which honors those institutions whose educational and administrative innovations have markedly improved the total learner experience. This includes their addressing of new and changing dynamics in fields such as student recruitment, financial aid, enrollment, retention and assessment, graduation, and beyond

title: Zayed University Bags first prize at the ISCES Student Contest in China
summary: Zayed University students research paper was awarded the First prize out of 400 different participations during the 2019 International Student Conference on Environment and Sustainability (ISCES 2019), which was held recently in Shanghai, China.

title: Educational Achievement and Leadership Excellence Are Main Pillars of Zayed University, Noura Al Kaabi
summary: H.E Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, honored 1112 students for their excellence to receive the honorary degree "Dean's List" in the first semester of the academic year 2018-2019 at a cumulative grade (3.6 and above).

title: Zayed University Hosts the 5th Graduate Students Research Conference
summary: The fifth Graduate Students Research Conference (GSRC) was hosted at Zayed University yesterday, welcoming participating academic units from the UAE to share knowledge and interconnect to maximize research collaboration.

title: ZU Hosts the 11th International URC Conference
summary: Zayed University held the 11th Annual Conference on Undergraduate Research on Applied Computing (URC2019) which was held at the University's campus in Dubai to promote research activity at educational institutions across the region.

title: QS Maple Strategic Summit For University Excellency
summary: A major international conference to debate barriers to university research excellence faced by academics in the Middle East and Africa was recently held at Zayed University.

title: Students Present Proper Enterprise Models and Guarantee Future Leadership Skills, Noura AlKaabi
summary: Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, recently inaugurated showCACE the 2019 senior exhibition.

title: Abdullah bin Zayed launches six new research centres at ZU
summary: H.H. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, Chairman of the Educational and Human Resources Council, has launched six new research centres at Zayed University.

title: Hamed bin Zayed Attends Zayed University Exceptional Students Graduation Ceremony
summary: H.H. Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Chief of the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince's Court, has witnessed this evening's graduation celebration at Zayed University of 217 exceptional bachelor's and master's degree students from the 2017/2018 academic year.

title: Traditional Chinese Incense Day held at Zayed University
summary: The Chinese Confucius Institute, located at Zayed University, has recently entertained students and faculty members with Traditional aromatic Incense arrangement displays, associated rhythmic dances, and the ancient Han Dynasty Chinese cha (tea) preparations.

title: The Largest Zayed University TEDx Talk Staged
summary: Supported by Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, TedxZayedUniversity was recently staged at Zayed University, Dubai. The event showcased the talents of students, alumni and faculty from the University along with a select group of guest speakers from across the UAE.

title: Zayed University Hosts the largest Career Spotlight 2019
summary: One of many aiding-hands offered by Zayed University, thousands of undergraduates, took on the occasion to explore future jobs offered by 140 participating companies in the biggest yet Careers Spotlight Fair.

title: Zayed University Hosts 2nd ALLT International Conference and Exhibition
summary: Under the Patronage of Her Excellency Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture And Knowledge Development, President Of Zayed University, the 2nd edition of the Applied Linguistics & Language Teaching (ALLT) International Conference & Exhibition was launched to showcase Latest Technologies and Practices in the field.

title: Scientific Forum Held by Zayed University and HMHC
summary: Innovation is never a tool to surpass heritage, experts argued during a recently jointly held forum by The Hamdan bin Mohammed Heritage Center and Zayed University.

title: ZU Hosts 2nd Learning Difficulties Awareness Campaign
summary: Did you know that Steven Spielberg, Jennifer Aniston, and Thomas Edison were born with Dyslexia? Albert Einstein and Cher suffered Dyscalculia.

title: Zayed University 2nd Annual Education Conference
summary: The 2nd annual Education Conference was held at the Dubai Zayed University campus recently to address norms shaping the future with innovative quality teaching to guarantee a successful teaching and learning environment for students at all stages.

title: Zayed University inaugurates largest Bloomberg Finance Lab in the Middle East
summary: Zayed University, one of the United Arab Emirates' top universities, and Bloomberg, the global financial information and technology company, today announced the opening of the Bloomberg Finance Lab at the university's Dubai campus. Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development and President of Zayed University, and Matthew Winkler, Co-founder and Editor-in-Chief Emeritus, Bloomberg News, officially launched the Bloomberg Finance Lab, which is the largest of its kind in the Middle East.

title: Noura Al Kaabi Inaugurates New Warehouse Space in Partnership with Alserkal Avenue, Dubai
summary: H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, has inaugurated the Zayed University Urban Satellite Space (ZUUSS), a partnership with Alserkal Avenue, that aims to support students' talents and sharpen their artistic abilities.

title: Noura Al Kaabi Inaugurates New Warehouse Space in Partnership with Alserkal Avenue, Dubai
summary: H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, has inaugurated the Zayed University Urban Satellite Space (ZUUSS), a partnership with Alserkal Avenue, that aims to support students' talents and sharpen their artistic abilities.

title: Zayed University inaugurates largest Bloomberg Finance Lab in the Middle East
summary: Zayed University, one of the United Arab Emirates' top universities, and Bloomberg, the global financial information and technology company, today announced the opening of the Bloomberg Finance Lab at the university's Dubai campus. Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development and President of Zayed University, and Matthew Winkler, Co-founder and Editor-in-Chief Emeritus, Bloomberg News, officially launched the Bloomberg Finance Lab, which is the largest of its kind in the Middle East.

title: The Largest Zayed University TEDx Talk Staged
summary: Supported by Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, TedxZayedUniversity was recently staged at Zayed University, Dubai. The event showcased the talents of students, alumni and faculty from the University along with a select group of guest speakers from across the UAE.

title: Zayed University Hosts the largest Career Spotlight 2019
summary: One of many aiding-hands offered by Zayed University, thousands of undergraduates, took on the occasion to explore future jobs offered by 140 participating companies in the biggest yet Careers Spotlight Fair.

title: Zayed University Hosts 2nd ALLT International Conference and Exhibition
summary: Under the Patronage of Her Excellency Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture And Knowledge Development, President Of Zayed University, the 2nd edition of the Applied Linguistics & Language Teaching (ALLT) International Conference & Exhibition was launched to showcase Latest Technologies and Practices in the field.

title: Scientific Forum Held by Zayed University and HMHC
summary: Innovation is never a tool to surpass heritage, experts argued during a recently jointly held forum by The Hamdan bin Mohammed Heritage Center and Zayed University.

title: ZU Hosts 2nd Learning Difficulties Awareness Campaign
summary: Did you know that Steven Spielberg, Jennifer Aniston, and Thomas Edison were born with Dyslexia? Albert Einstein and Cher suffered Dyscalculia.

title: Traditional Chinese Incense Day held at Zayed University
summary: The Chinese Confucius Institute, located at Zayed University, has recently entertained students and faculty members with Traditional aromatic Incense arrangement displays, associated rhythmic dances, and the ancient Han Dynasty Chinese cha (tea) preparations.

title: Zayed University 2nd Annual Education Conference
summary: The 2nd annual Education Conference was held at the Dubai Zayed University campus recently to address norms shaping the future with innovative quality teaching to guarantee a successful teaching and learning environment for students at all stages.

title: Zayed University Hosts the 5th Graduate Students Research Conference
summary: The fifth Graduate Students Research Conference (GSRC) was hosted at Zayed University yesterday, welcoming participating academic units from the UAE to share knowledge and interconnect to maximize research collaboration.

title: ZU Hosts the 11th International URC Conference
summary: Zayed University held the 11th Annual Conference on Undergraduate Research on Applied Computing (URC2019) which was held at the University's campus in Dubai to promote research activity at educational institutions across the region.

title: Hamed bin Zayed Attends Zayed University Exceptional Students Graduation Ceremony
summary: H.H. Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Chief of the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince's Court, has witnessed this evening's graduation celebration at Zayed University of 217 exceptional bachelor's and master's degree students from the 2017/2018 academic year.

title: QS Maple Strategic Summit For University Excellency
summary: A major international conference to debate barriers to university research excellence faced by academics in the Middle East and Africa was recently held at Zayed University.

title: Students Present Proper Enterprise Models and Guarantee Future Leadership Skills, Noura AlKaabi
summary: Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, recently inaugurated showCACE the 2019 senior exhibition.

title: Educational Achievement and Leadership Excellence Are Main Pillars of Zayed University, Noura Al Kaabi
summary: H.E Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, honored 1112 students for their excellence to receive the honorary degree "Dean's List" in the first semester of the academic year 2018-2019 at a cumulative grade (3.6 and above).

title: Abdullah bin Zayed launches six new research centres at ZU
summary: H.H. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, Chairman of the Educational and Human Resources Council, has launched six new research centres at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University Wins Blackboard Catalyst Award
summary: Staff from Zayed University, were named winners of the Blackboard Catalyst Award for Optimizing Student Experience which honors those institutions whose educational and administrative innovations have markedly improved the total learner experience. This includes their addressing of new and changing dynamics in fields such as student recruitment, financial aid, enrollment, retention and assessment, graduation, and beyond

title: Health at hand: how smartwatches are revolutionising healthcare
summary: Once, they were all about how many steps we took. Now, smartwatches can track the most intimate details of our health and fitness. Asad Khattak, mobile computing and health informatics expert at Zayed University, evaluates the impact of next-generation wearable technology for the healthcare industry

title: Zayed University Bags first prize at the ISCES Student Contest in China
summary: Zayed University students research paper was awarded the First prize out of 400 different participations during the 2019 International Student Conference on Environment and Sustainability (ISCES 2019), which was held recently in Shanghai, China.

title: Noura Al Kaabi Joins Zayed University Students for UAE 48th National Day Celebrations
summary: Noura Bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, joined the students 48th National Day Celebrations in Abu Dhabi ZU campus.

title: Zayed University Received a QS 4 star Rating
summary: The QS Intelligence Unit has accepted the application submitted by the Office of the Provost and the office of institutional Research, and has awarded the University through QS Stars, a “four Stars” institution rating. Notably, ZU was awarded “Five Stars” within the core criteria of Teaching, employability, facilities and Inclusiveness

title: UAE - Korea Cultural Dialogue Initiates with Festive Welcome at Zayed University
summary: A major festival was organized yesterday, at the Abu Dhabi Zayed University campus, to initiate the UAE-Korea Cultural Dialogue for 2020, which commemorates the 40th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the two nations.

title: Women Constitute Over 60% of The Science Fields in the Arab World, Lectures Dr. Dajani
summary: UNESCO International Literacy Prize winner, and 12th out of 100 most influential Arab women, Dr. Rana Dajani was recently hosted at Zayed University Abu Dhabi campus to lecture students about the five roles she plays in life.

title: GCC Seeks Economic Unity by 2025, Says Secretary General
summary: The Secretary-General of the Gulf Cooperation Council, H.E. Dr. Abdullatif bin Rashid Al-Zayani visited Zayed University campus in Dubai today. He was warmly welcomed by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, alongside Dr. Behjat Al Yousuf, Acting Vice-President of Zayed University.

title: Students Guided to Suitable Academic Majors and Career Paths
summary: "Major's Day", an annual academic guidance program, was recently organized on both Zayed University campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, where teachers assisted hundreds of students in choosing their majors and, therefore, their future careers.

title: Al Maktoum Foundation Supports Zayed University Student Solidarity Fund
summary: His Excellency Mirza Al Sayegh, Member of the Board of Trustees of the Foundation and Director of the Office of H.H. Sheikh Hamdan bin Rashid Al Maktoum, handed Al Maktoum Foundation’s donation cheque worth AED300,000 to Dr. Behjat Al Yousuf, Vice-President of Zayed University, to support the Student Solidarity Fund.

title: Five Student Projects Turn Heads at Abu Dhabi Municipality Innovation Nation Activities
summary: Zayed University students participated in the "Innovation Nation" activities, which was organized by the Abu Dhabi City Municipality for the UAE Innovation Month, which comes in line with the UAE's strategy to prepare a new generation of talents as it transitions into a competitive knowledge-based economy.

title: Emirates Airline Festival of Literature and Ministry of Culture and Knowledge Development Organize a Lecture by American Writer Lesley Hazleton at Zayed University
summary: Under the Patronage and presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, the award-winning journalist, historian, and blogger, Lesley Hazleton, gave a lecture at Zayed University her take on the story of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) in her bestseller "The First Muslim: Story of Muhammed” as part of the Emirates Airline Festival of Literature’s Education Programme.

title: Students Safety and Security Forefronts Zayed University's Objectives
summary: 40 government and private companies showcased a variety of best practices in environmental protection, sustainability, health and safety during the 4th annual Environmental Health and Safety Campaign EHS-EVENT 2020, held on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai.

title: UAE - Japan Seek Further Cultural Ties, Japanese Ambassador
summary: His Excellency Akihiko Nakajima, the Ambassador of Japan to the UAE, believes that both nations, have actively developed bilateral relations in various sectors, and aims to further foster cultural development.

title: Drone Forensics Study and a Hacker Detector Showcased by ZU Students at the UMEX 2020
summary: 12 students from the College of Technological Innovation (CTI) of Zayed University showcased eight innovative projects related to drones, robotics, security, and autonomous systems, during the participation at the the Unmanned Systems Exhibition and Conference (UMEX) and Simulation and Training Exhibition and Conference (SimTEX).

title: Noura Al-Kaabi receives the Saudi Minister of Education at Zayed University
summary: Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammad Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, received His Excellency Dr. Hamad bin Muhammad Al Sheikh, Saudi Minister of Education and the accompanying delegation to the Zayed University's Dubai campus.

title: Public Diplomacy Shapes the Image of a Nation, Lectures Omar Ghobash
summary: His Excellency Omar Ghobash, Assistant Minister of Culture and Public Diplomacy – Ministry of Foreign Affairs, was warmly greeted at Zayed University recently to lecture students his take on "How Public Diplomacy Shapes the Image of a Nation."

title: Noura Al Kaabi Heads the First Zayed University Council 2020 Meeting
summary: Zayed University Council held its first meeting in 2020 led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, at the University's campus in Dubai recently.

title: Highest Education Quality Via Modern Technologies Remains Top Priority, Noura Al Kaabi
summary: In line with the UAE’s recent directives of enabling Online Learning across all educational institutions, Zayed University achieved tangible results, response, and great interaction in the distance learning experience after the end of the first week, as the faculty members succeeded in holding more than 7718 lectures and meetings via the Internet.

title: From Campus to Computer, your education is Zayed University's priority
summary: Following the last three weeks of Remote Learning, the management at Zayed Unit is very much aware of the concerns, uncertainty and challenges that our students have been experiencing during these trying times.

title: Special Grading Model Introduced at Zayed University Amid Remote-Learning Period
summary: Following the three weeks of Remote Learning, Zayed University (ZU) announced the implementation of a special grading model for courses of the Spring 2020 semester, to ensure students GPA won’t get effected due to current circumstances.

title: Zayed University Member Wins Prestigious Sheikh Zayed Book Award
summary: Zayed University Assistant professor, Dr. Mohamed Mihoub, was granted the prestigious Sheikh Zayed Book Award; one of the Arab world's most lucrative literary prizes, for his efforts in translating "Al-Insan Al-Romantiq" (L'homme Romantique) by the French Philosopher, Georges Gusdorf.

title: Emirati Professor Lands a Research Patent from the United States
summary: A patent was recently registered in the United States by Emirati researcher Dr. Fatima Taher, associate professor and assistant dean for research affairs at the College of Technical Innovation at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University Hosts the 12th Undergraduate Research Conference: Over 600 Participants from 7 countries attend Virtually
summary: Under the patronage of H.E. Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University (ZU), the 12th Annual Conference on Undergraduate Research on Applied Computing (URC2020) was, and for the very first time, held remotely online, due to the on-going events concerning COVID-19, and for the safety and health of everyone.

title: Institutes Partner to Prepare University Students and Graduates for  Market of the Future
summary: Zayed University (ZU) and the Abdulla Al Ghurair Foundation for Education (AGFE), have virtually signed a Memorandum of Understanding to support young Emiratis and Arab youth along their education and early employment journeys.

title: University Council holds its second meeting for 2020
summary: Members of the Zayed University Council virtually met online and attended their second meeting for the 2019-2020 Academic year. The meeting was led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University, to review several topics on their agenda.

title: Zayed University and Al-Mubarakah Foundation Collaborate to Drive More Emirati Youth Into Volunteering
summary: Sheikh Mohammed bin Khalifa bin Hamdan Al Nahyan, of the "Mubarakah Foundation" and Her Excellency Noura bint Muhammad Al-Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Knowledge Development, President of Zayed University have recently virtually signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU), to encourage youth volunteering, as per the UAE leadership's aspirations.

title: Her Highness Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak, Patron of Zayed University Applauds Graduates at 2020 Virtual Commencement Ceremony
summary: Under the patronage of Her Highness Sheikha Fatima bint Mubarak, Chairwoman of the General Women's Union, President of the Supreme Council for Motherhood and Childhood, and Supreme Chairwoman of the Family Development Foundation, Zayed University held its very first "virtual" graduation ceremony, to honor undergraduates and graduates of the 18th cohort of female and the 8th cohort of males.

title: Zayed University Switches to Hybrid Model of Teaching, Learning for Fall 2020 Semester
summary: Preparations are in full swing at Zayed University’s (ZU) campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai to implement a hybrid education model for the Fall 2020 semester. The "hybrid" (or "blended") education model aims to enable teaching and learning to continue both online and partially on campus, amid the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Zayed University Continues to Demonstrate Steadfast Growth Year on Year:  Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi
summary: Her Excellency Noura Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth and President of Zayed University, commended the organizations and entities for their support to the University's exceptional achievements in the field of higher education, and played a significant role in supporting (ZU) students during the academic year of 2019/2020.

title: Zayed University Lands the Times Higher Education 2021 World University Rankings
summary: Zayed University, a national and regional leader of educational innovation, has been recently listed, for the very first time, in the 2021 Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings, which is an annual ranking of higher education institutions globally.

title: Zayed University Indorses the Importance of Mental Health
summary: Zayed University raised awareness about the importance of mental health through a series of virtual activities and workshops titled "Your Mental Health Matters" coinciding with the World Mental Health Day 2020, under the theme "Mental Health for All: Greater Investment - Greater Access."

title: Zayed University and the Mexican Embassy discuss ways of cooperation in the cultural and academic fields
summary: Zayed University held a virtual meeting with the Mexican Embassy, in the presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Her Excellency Francisca E. Méndez Escobar, Ambassador of Mexico to the country, to discuss ways of future cooperation and partnerships in the cultural and academic fields.

title: Zayed University's 3rd Annual Education Conference Scheduled to Explore the Next 50 Years in Education
summary: In partnership with the Ministry of Education and Arab Thought Foundation, Zayed University will be hosting the 3rd annual Education Conference, themed “Zayed’s Legacy: the next 50 years start now” which will be held online on Monday, November 9th, and will be attended by Ministers and a number of international educational experts.

title: Zayed University Celebrates the UAE Flag Day
summary: Zayed University celebrated the UAE Flag Day on both campuses in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, commemorating the accession of His Highness Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al-Nahyan as the president of the UAE.

title: Zayed University Students Share Experience of Craft Workshop in Hawaii
summary: Zayed University (ZU) Students from the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) have virtually shared their overseas visit to the Island of Oahu, which was part of an exchange meeting with students from the University of Hawaii at Manoa, and presented their take on the new culture and craft workshops.

title: Experts Discuss the Next Five Decades in Education to Meet UAE Centennial Objectives
summary: Zayed University virtually held the 3rd annual Education Conference "Zayed's Legacy: the next 50 years start now" hosting over 500 education experts to address and explore the future of education over the next 5 decades for the UAE Centennial 2071 Objectives. The conference was organized in collaboration between Zayed University's College of Education, UAE Ministry of Education and the Arab Thought Foundation.

title: Academic Collaboration in Cultural Heritage between Zayed University and the Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport in Egypt
summary: Zayed University held virtually a webinar session organized by the College of Humanities and Social Sciences at Zayed University and the College of Archeology and Cultural Heritage at the Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime Transport in Egypt to discuss ways of cooperation between the two universities in the fields of culture and heritage.

title: Zayed University Offers Employment Opportunities to 840 Graduates and Students through a Virtual Career Fair
summary: "Gateway to Career Opportunities" was the theme of the first virtual career fair for the new academic year 2020/2021 organized by the Students Career and Alumni Department at Zayed University (ZU), with the aim of supporting Emiratization and providing employment opportunities for university students and graduates and helping them build their career options on practical grounds.

title: Noura Al Kaabi Welcomes New Zayed University Alumni Association Board Members
summary: Zayed University welcomed new 32 members to The Zayed University (ZU) Alumni Association Board for the 2020-2023 academic years in a recent online ceremony held under the patronage and attendance of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth and President of Zayed University.

title: Zayed University's First Incubated Startup, Takalam, Wins Enterprise Agility Award by Entrepreneur Middle East
summary: Health-tech start-up Takalam, an online counseling platform for mental well-being, recently won the Wellness Platform of The Year Award by Entrepreneur Middle East. This annual award series recognizes businesses and individuals across the Middle East that have established themselves as clear industry innovators.

title: Zayed University Graduates showCACE Arts Exhibition in Abu Dhabi
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has recently disclosed the latest edition of the showCACE 2020 Senior Exhibition showcasing 52 projects, covering the four majors in the College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE): visual arts, interior design, animation design and graphic design. The exhibition is currently being held at Manarat Al Saadiyat in Abu Dhabi until March 19th 2021.

title: ZU Student Lands 1st Place at the EY Corporate Finance Woman of the Year Awards
summary: Zayed University (ZU) student, Shama Al Hosani, has been recently named the winner of the Ernst & Young's (EY) Corporate Finance Woman of the Year (CWFY) award for the UAE, following a confront with seven shortlisted finalists from across the country.

title: Zayed University Wins 2 awards in the assessment of the Global Star Rating Systems for Services (GSRR)
summary: Zayed University has recently won 2 out of 4 service delivery channels awards, during its first participation in the assessment of the Global Star Rating Systems for Services (GSRR).

title: Internationally recognized Digital Marketing Certification for Zayed University business students
summary: Zayed University and the Digital Marketing Institute (DMI) have announced a new partnership that integrates DMI's industry leading digital marketing certifications into the Digital Marketing and Commerce course in the College of Business at Zayed University.

title: Zayed University celebrates learning diversity
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) at Zayed University (ZU) has recently organized an online event under the theme of 'Celebrate Learning Diversity'.

title: Zayed University Council holds 2nd meeting for 2021
summary: Led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), members of the Zayed University Council held their second meeting of 2021 to review several topics on the Council's agenda.

title: Zayed University Partners With IBM, Microsoft And SAP University to Boost Student Creativity and Employability
summary: A state-of-the-art innovation workspace 'The NextGen Center' was recently inaugurated by H.E. Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), at the ZU Campus in Dubai. The Center aims to provide students the opportunity to connect and co-innovate with global industry leaders.

title: Zayed University Council review policies and procedures related to interdisciplinary education, hybrid education courses and Student Affairs
summary: Zayed University Council held its third meeting for the year 2021, chaired by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, at the Convention Center at the University Campus in Dubai to review a number of topics on its agenda.

title: Zayed University partners with education innovator Minerva Project to launch the Middle East's first interdisciplinary programme
summary: Zayed University has joined forces with Minerva Project, the pathbreaking US-based educational innovator, to launch the first  interdisciplinary programme of study in the Middle East. The partnership, Zayed University X Minerva, was formally signed in Dubai on 8 June 2021 in the presence of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Ben Nelson, the Founder and CEO of Minerva Project.

title: Zayed University amongst the 700 Qs World University Ranking
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has increased by 50 ranks, up to the 651-700 range in the QS (Quacquarelli Symonds) World University Rankings 2022, the world’s most-consulted source of comparative information about university performance.

title: Zayed University Senior Projects 2021: An expression of reality through the eyes of young artists
summary: ShowCACE 2021 a creative arts exhibition was recently unveiled by Senior students from  Zayed University (ZU) College of Arts and Creative Enterprises (CACE) features project ideas and concepts around social awareness, productivity, healing and self-expression, and more.

title: Zayed University alumni host a virtual session highlighting the Importance of Innovation
summary: Zayed University Alumni Association, in coordination with the Student Careers and Alumni Department, hosted five graduates experts in the field of innovation and entrepreneurship, including graduates of the Mohammed Bin Rashid Center for government innovation.

title: Zayed University advances social responsibilty & gender equality agenda through a pioneering academic partnership with UN Women
summary: Celebrating the Emirati Women's Day, Zayed University (ZU) has become an ally of the UN Women Unstereotype Alliance UAE chapter, the first academic institution in the region to become an ally of the chapter.

title: Over 1,000 Emirati students enroll in the Al Ghurair Young Thinkers Program for career readiness
summary: Zayed University (ZU) and the Abdulla Al Ghurair Foundation for Education (AGFE), have successfully marked the first year of their partnership, following a Memorandum of Understanding between the two entities to support Emirati youth along their education and early employment journeys.

title: UAE's first Hyperspectral Remote Sensing Center offers spectral library website for public use
summary: The Hyperspectral Remote Sensing Center at the College of Natural and Health Sciences at Zayed University has earned a commendable badge by presenting the first UAE Spectral Library website for public use, where users can interact and access spectral information derived using a Use hyperspectral camera and Field Portable Spectroradiometers, as well as remote sensing images from space and airborne platforms for remote spectroscopic sensing.

title: 2730 Students get labour market practical training
summary: 2,730 Zayed University (ZU) alumni and students have recently joined the 1st edition of the ZU 'ZU Summer Career Camp 50x50' which focuses on students' capacity building, development of professional skills and preparing the youth for the requirements of the job market.

title: Zayed University moves up in the World University Rankings 2022 To 601-800
summary: Zayed University, a national and regional leader of educational innovation, has moved up in the 2022 Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings to 601-800 from the 801-1000 band in 2021.

title: Partnership to encourage more Emiratis to choose private over public sector
summary: Zayed University (ZU) a leading academic institution in the UAE, has recently connected with Al Fardan Exchange to offer 100 Emirati students and alumni free online training programs in Anti-Money laundering, Identifying fake currencies, and risk management.

title: Zayed University welcomed over 1200 prospective students at the International Education Show
summary: Zayed University (ZU) has welcomed over 1200 students for the upcoming Fall 2022 during their participation at the 17th International Education Show which was held for three days starting Oct 19th to Oct 21 at the Sharjah Expo Center.

title: Zayed University discusses employability of people with visual impairment
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) at Zayed University (ZU) celebrated the annual 'International White Cane Day' by hosting a virtual event that addressed and discussed Employability of people with vision impairment.

title: Nasa Deputy Administrator stirs Zayed University students to become the aspiring leaders of the future
summary: Deputy Administrator of NASA, Col. (USAF, ret) Pam Melroy was recently received to lecture at the Zayed University Dubai campus' atrium, where she enlightened STEM students about the necessity of setting up the next generation for success and exploring ways of becoming the leaders they aspire to be.

title: Zayed University embarks on academic partnership with University of Haifa
summary: H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, and Prof. Ron Robin, President of Haifa University, Zayed University (ZU) have recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding virtually to form an academic partnership to cooperate on projects that promote research, education, outreach, and capacity building.

title: Zayed University to celebrate UAE's golden jubilee through the Middle East Film Festival
summary: Under the patronage of H.E Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, the 11th annual Zayed University Middle East Film Festival (ZUMEFF) has been scheduled to take place online between Nov 16th to 18th, 2021.

title: Zayed University students design & co-create solutions for a more balanced and equal world
summary: Zayed University female students participated in an interactive session to co-create and design solutions for a diverse set of pre-defined challenges under the 5th Global Goal for Sustainable Development (SDG5): "Gender equality including women empowerment" such as disadvantaged communities, leadership representation of women in all sectors, senior management and board positions, and the elimination of bias and stereotypes through the use of technology.

title: Zayed University joins a premier international conference to explore security of microelectronic systems
summary: Zayed University has joined as the technical sponsor of the recently hosted 28th IEEE International Conference on Electronics Circuits and Systems at Sofitel Dubai the Obelisk. The four-day show focused on the design and innovation aspect of the circuits and systems space.

title: Zayed University Council discusses a number of policies and procedures for a future full of achievements over the next 50 years
summary: Zayed University Council held its fourth and last meeting for the academic year 2021/2022, chaired by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University, at the VIP Hall in the UAE pavilion at Expo 2020 Dubai. The meeting agenda focused on future-focused policies that aligned the academic agenda with the nation's vision.

title: Zayed University Organizes An Awareness Initiative To Improve The Quality Of Education For Students Of Determination
summary: The Student Accessibility Services Department (SAS) at Zayed University organized an awareness campaign with the participation of Al Ahlia Charitable Schools to improve students of determination teaching quality, effectiveness and easy access to educational services.

title: Zayed University named Apple distinguished school
summary: The Department of Student Accessibility Services (SAS) is pleased to announce that it has been recognized as an Apple Distinguished School for 2021-2024, for being continuously innovative in learning, teaching, and providing an excellent educational environment for Students of Determination at Zayed University.

title: International Competition aims to stimulate innovative development towards the enhancement of the education sector
summary: On the occasion of "UAE Innovates 2022", Zayed University launches an international virtual competition titled "IDEATHON 2022", targeting school and university students from all over the world between the ages of 17 and 20 years old, to bring forward and create innovative solutions that contribute to enhancing education in schools and universities.

title: Zayed University Inks An Academic Agreement With University Of Madda Walabu
summary: Zayed University signed a cooperation agreement with the Ethiopian University of Madda Walabu to explore new grounds of academic research, educational programs, and training opportunities for university students.

title: Zayed University participates in the Global Education and Training Exhibition 2022
summary: Zayed University (ZU) participates in the Global Education and Training Exhibition 2022 (GETEX), which is held under the patronage of His Excellency Sheikh Nahyan bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of Tolerance and Coexistence in the UAE, at the Sheikh Rashid Hall - Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Center from February 24 to 26.

title: Zayed University Receives Malaysian Minister Of Women, Family And Community Development
summary: Members of the Zayed University (ZU) has recently received Her Excellency Rina Harun, Minister of Women's Affairs, Family and Community Development - Malaysia, during a recent visit by her and her accompanying delegation to the university campus in Dubai.

title: Zayed University to Celebrate Class of 'Future Makers' Graduation Ceremony March 14th to 16th at Expo 2020
summary: Under the patronage of Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), the University announced its preparation to celebrate the graduation ceremony of the 19th and 20th Cohort of Female undergraduates, 9th and 10th Cohorts of Male undergraduates and selected cohorts of Master graduates, which will be taking place in person at the North Hall of the Dubai Exhibition Center at EXPO 2020 from the 14th to the 16th of March, 2022.

title: Hamed Bin Zayed Attends the Graduation of Zayed University Masters Graduates & Honors Graduates and Undergraduates
summary: Under the patronage and in the presence of His Highness Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Member of the Executive Council of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi,  Zayed University celebrated its 2022 Graduation Ceremony under the theme "Future Makers" , with 618 Masters Graduates & Honors Undergraduate Students during an exceptional event held on Wednesday (March 16th) in the presence of His Excellency Sheikh Shakhboot Bin Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, Minister of State, and other VIP guests at EXPO 2020 in the North Hall of the Dubai Exhibition Centre.

title: Zayed University and AD Ports Group ink MoU for Development of Maritime Sustainability Solutions and Education
summary: Zayed University, one of Dubai's leading public universities, has signed an MoU with AD Ports Group, the region's premier facilitator of logistics, industry, and trade in Abu Dhabi, to spearhead a number of sustainable development goals across several key areas.

title: Zayed University Council discuss strategic plans to meet future employment market demands
summary: Led by Her Excellency Noura bint Mohammed Al Kaabi, Minister of Culture and Youth, President of Zayed University (ZU), members of the Zayed University Council held the second meeting of 2022 to review several topics on the Council's agenda.

title: Zayed University professor leads uranium geology research in the MENA region
summary: A newly published book, entitled 'Uranium Geology in the Middle East and North Africa,' highlights the major reserves of resources that the region enjoys, tackles the exploration era and Development Program around that exclusive field.

title: Zayed University students land 2nd-prize at leading international environment & sustainability competition
summary: A team of three students from Zayed University's (ZU), College of Natural & Health Sciences (CNHS), have recently won the second place prize in the Smart Environment Category at the 2022 International Student Conference on Environment and Sustainability (ISCES 2022), which was held  at Tongji University in China.
